cast.overview: A transit worker pulls commuter Peter off railway tracks after he's mugged, but—while he's in a coma—his family mistakenly thinks she's Peter's fiancée, and she doesn't correct them. Things get more complicated when she falls for his brother, who's not quite sure that she's who she claims to be.
cast.title: While You Were Sleeping

cast.overview: Raised in a poverty-stricken slum, a 16-year-old girl named Starr now attends a suburban prep school. After she witnesses a police officer shoot her unarmed best friend, she's torn between her two very different worlds as she tries to speak her truth.
cast.title: The Hate U Give

details.biography: Marcia Wright is known for her work on Während du schliefst (1995), Barbershop - Ein haarscharfes Viertel (2002) and Soul Food (1997). She has been married to George Tillman Jr. since July 15, 1995. They have one child.
details.name: Marcia Wright
